title: LOW PRIORITY
body: EXCUSE ME RIOT, you give me a 20 minute low priority when it is my first time leaving a game. i think this is quite disrespectful because this was my first time leaving a game, and i rejoin the game 5mins late and you give me a 20 minute low priority, is this fair?? at least give me like a 5 minute low prio, i think that wouldve been fair, but you considering giving me a 20 minute i dont think thats fair. please remove my low priority..

replies.body:
Hey KingNeluu,

Leaver Buster starts with a warning the first time, then 5 minute Low Priority Queue and +5 each time after, so this likely isn't your first time marked as a leaver. You have to play a lot of games without leaving for your leaver status to diminish down back to 5 minute LPQ's. If you have questions about the system, please read the [Leaver Buster FAQ here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).

If you have neither left any other games nor received 5-15 minute LPQ's before, then more likely than a bug is that someone else was using your account. Account sharing is against the [Terms of Use](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse) under all circumstances. If you believe someone else has been on your account without authorization, please visit the [Protecting Your Account article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) and follow the steps to keep your account secure.

If you still believe this to be a bug (or you need to contact Riot about someone else being on your account), you may submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

-DTN
hey, i actually never have left any games before hand, in my memory but yeah :/
yoo man that was unfair for him u spastic deep terror nami
